name: All In The Story
description:
You are Herman 'Ramble' Fortner, a small-time con man being interrogated by Detective Russo after a ship blew up in the New York harbor. You must tell your story. How you got involved with a crew of criminals, was forced into a suicide heist, and saw the crime boss, Lazar Cebo, a man who according to legend cannot die because he is the Devil. As you recount events, the choices you make with affect how your story ends. Your chance at freedom lies All In The Story...

CW: Strong Language, Crime,  Violence, Death
